title: Are Kled and Teemo actually... related?
body:
Kled says about Teemo:

> Just 'cause we was kin don't mean I ain't feeding you to Skaarl!
 Hey cous', glad you came to visit!
 A relative's just another unwanted guest.

Now, I could see how he calls him "kin" and "cous" just because they are both Yordles, but word "relative" seems to mean they have actual blood ties, even if distant ones.

This would check out, as they are both wacko Yordle killers and such things sometimes run in the family, but I need a confirmation.

replies.body: I believe it is probably safe to say they are related yes

{{champion:17}} "I am your father."
https://media.giphy.com/media/14kjySOKhofYI/giphy.gif

Kled has Mushroom quotes, too. COINCIDENCE? I think not.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
The mushroom quote about illaoi tentacles is perfect lmao

> [{quoted}](name=LaxGrip,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=klsuPvdE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-27T15:03:10.078+0000)
>
> I believe it is probably safe to say they are related yes

yes the both are the two yordals that i have noticed that have tails
not shure if {{champion:115}} or anyone else
all yordals are going to be related but the two might a bit closer
speech 100
So the redneck and the spawn of satan could be related? That's just frightening to think about.
Yet appropriate.

Teemo is just a scout in the yordle army.
he's not a "crazy yordle killer". All that's stated in his lore is that he turns serious when in combat. outside of combat he has a warm personality.

> [{quoted}](name=Vape Naysh YalI,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=klsuPvdE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-27T17:30:26.727+0000)
>
> Teemo is just a scout in the yordle army.
> he's not a "crazy yordle killer". All that's stated in his lore is that he turns serious when in combat. outside of combat he has a warm personality.

The lore says he kills mercilessly and does his orders to the letter. If Teemo was ordered to murder a village of people by Bandle City, he'd do it. And he'd be just as bubbly when he returned. That's his thing.
That sounds like a high functioning psychopath.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Zudane,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=klsuPvdE,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2016-07-27T21:10:13.905+0000)
>
> That sounds like a high functioning psychopath.

Arguable. Teemo wouldn't just go out and kill people. He just values duty very highly and wouldn't disobey the order...

And someone that could kill an entire village without remorse would be a psychopath.  It's the type of person you want in a position like that, but it doesn't make it any less true.  Someone with no problem killing is the type of person that makes a good killer, and someone with no problem killing is a psychopath.  If he's also friendly most of the time then he's high functioning.

Put that together and we get a whopping: High functioning psychopath.  Yes, he's a ruthless killer at times - that's because he's a psychopath.

Tristana, who probably knows him the best, says he is on the verge of becoming an unrepentant killer.

Having warm personality, but not being burdened by lives he takes heavily implies Teemo is a high-functioning sociopath.
omega squad teemos like the future

Kinda. The actual quote is "Teemo rides a thin line between chipper compatriot and unrepentant killer, but there's no one else I'd rather have as a friend.". She didn't say that he is on the verge of becoming one, just that he walks the line between them. He becomes a different person on the battlefield, almost like his core personality traits change completely. While he may be a high functioning sociopath I just think there's more to it then that.

> verge
> noun
>     1.
>     an edge or border.

So there's a thin line between them - sounds like what one would call an edge, or a border.  Being on that line, also called an edge or border would very well fit the definition of "on the verge."  It doesn't say he is going to - just that he's at the edge of it - and if he goes crazy it's better to be a friend than an enemy.
Teemo is sherlock confirmed?

After all, Jhin is awfully warm and nonthreatening in real life when the mask is off.

Teemo is as physcotic as Jhin confirmed.

> [{quoted}](name=BigBadBadger,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=klsuPvdE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-07-27T18:22:00.471+0000)
>
> Tristana, who probably knows him the best, says he is on the verge of becoming an unrepentant killer.
> 
> Having warm personality, but not being burdened by lives he takes heavily implies Teemo is a high-functioning psychopath.

Ftfy. Sociopaths aren't so bad.
Pls stop posting, i love teemo even more because of you. I now actually think he's badass. Thanks, but no thanks.
http://leaguememe.com/uploads/league/6306765656.jpg

I'm pretty sure those and a bunch more are taunts for yordles in general, not Teemo specifically, since he says things like:

 "Just 'cause we was kin don't mean I ain't feeding you to Skaarl!"
 "Hey cous', glad you came to visit!"
 "A relative's just another unwanted guest."
 "Afraid I had to cut your visit short."
 "You ain't cute now!"
 "Aw, you are so cute... 'fore I ripped your fuzzy head off!"
 "I could feel bad about killing you, or we could stomp on your corpse!"
 "You was cute - lousy, but cute."

All of this comes after taunts for Talon, so it could be Teemo, or yordles in general. I'm inclined to say it's for yordles in general.
Hm, just a moment ago Wiki said those were all lines he says when killing enemy Teemo, but since it no longer does I now assume it was wrong...

It's on the pbe and few people can test it so it was likely put there by someone who thought it was true and wanted to fix it, but was then corrected by someone else for it being unconfirmed in the first place.

What about gnar? Gnar was some kind of a primitive yordle that also has a bloodthirsty side to him. Remember that Kled's "lore" mentioned that he fought in almost every noxian campaign which suggests that Kled could potentially be as old as noxus itself. Noxus probably wasn't established around gnar's prehistoric reign so i think gnar could be Kled's ancestor as they have quite a few similarities.
"I-Is th-that ANOTHER SHORT JOKE"{{champion:45}}
The champion VO files are in alphabetical order, not in order of relevance
And Y is after T.

If you go far back enough everyone has a common ancestor so everyone of a certain species is kin and that is how the word commonly used when you have a setting with multiple sentient and intelligent lifeforms.
technically al yordles are related and are the cousins of each other altho far far cousins
you think i'm crazy? you should see my sister {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Made a video explaining Kled: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uRVad15_O-w

Not confirmed it's said directly to Teemo, could be any Yordle. Every yordle is pretty much related, they are all yordles after all...I don't think Teemo and kled are CLOSELY related because everytime Riot puts out a Yordle champion people say it's related to Teemo. Their personalities don't match aside from the way they fight. 

We have no idea about Teemo's age, but he seems young in the Yordle world because he's just a scout, and his voice is so light sounds like he inhaled a helium balloon. We know Kled is old because he was there while Noxus was being founded, and his voice got some more bass to it. Satan is more closely related to Teemo than Kled imo.

Not going to lie I
 thought the title said retarded {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Dude I can't unsee it now.
Would make sense... theyre both a few screws loose in the head....
Satan is an ancient beast.
